casebody.data:
THE UNITED STATES, PETITIONER, v. IVAN M. ELCHIBEGOFF [No. 46271] [106 C. Cls. 541;

329 U. S. —]

Suit for salary; Government employee discharged without proper hearing. Judgment for plaintiff.

*716Defendant’s petition for writ of certiorari granted November 12, 1946.

On February 3, 1947, the following order was entered by the Supreme Court:

The motion by respondent to enlarge the issues is denied. . .The writ of certiorari is dismissed on motion of counsel for the petitioner.
